metadata.title: CVE-2015-5685 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The lazy_bdecode function in BitTorrent DHT bootstrap server (bootstrap-dht) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted packet,related to "improper indexing."

criterions.comment: libtorrent-rasterbar: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
